channel.title: PI shop help
channel.description: okai so i added the pk point shop and when i click it, it says 250 pk points and i have 50000 pk points but when i try to buy it says i dont have enough coins please somone help.

item.title: PI shop help
item.dc:creator: @Jake2008 Jake2008
item.description:
@Jake2008 wrote:

somwhere it has currencys for shops… it will be like

search for “995” in the file and then see where it is taking coins, just add an if statement for your shop id to remove pkp instead of coins.

if its just the message that isnt working, search for “you dont have enough coins” and add an if statement for your shop to change the message.

best of luck! pm if you need further help!

Read full topic
